verses.ar: قٓۚ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡمَجِيدِ
verses.en: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an

verses.ar: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.en: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing

verses.ar: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ
verses.en: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return

verses.ar: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ
verses.en: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record

verses.ar: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.en: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition

verses.ar: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ
verses.en: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts

verses.ar: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجِۭ بَهِيجٖ
verses.en: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind

verses.ar: تَبۡصِرَةٗ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبۡدٖ مُّنِيبٖ
verses.en: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah]

verses.ar: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ
verses.en: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

verses.ar: وَٱلنَّخۡلَ بَاسِقَٰتٖ لَّهَا طَلۡعٞ نَّضِيدٞ
verses.en: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers

verses.ar: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ
verses.en: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection

verses.ar: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.en: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

verses.ar: وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ وَإِخۡوَٰنُ لُوطٖ
verses.en: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

verses.ar: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.en: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled

verses.ar: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ
verses.en: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ وَنَعۡلَمُ مَا تُوَسۡوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفۡسُهُۥۖ وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنۡ حَبۡلِ ٱلۡوَرِيدِ
verses.en: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

verses.ar: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ
verses.en: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left

verses.ar: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ
verses.en: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record]

verses.ar: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.en: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid

verses.ar: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ
verses.en: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat

verses.ar: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ
verses.en: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness

verses.ar: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ حَدِيدٞ
verses.en: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp

verses.ar: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.en: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared

verses.ar: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ
verses.en: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever

verses.ar: مَّنَّاعٖ لِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٖ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.en: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter

verses.ar: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.en: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment

verses.ar: ۞قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطۡغَيۡتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ
verses.en: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error

verses.ar: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ
verses.en: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning

verses.ar: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
verses.en: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ
verses.en: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more

verses.ar: وَأُزۡلِفَتِ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ غَيۡرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.en: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far

verses.ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ
verses.en: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

verses.ar: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.en: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance]

verses.ar: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُلُودِ
verses.en: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity

verses.ar: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ
verses.en: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more

verses.ar: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.en: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape

verses.ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ
verses.en: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind]

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٖ
verses.en: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness

verses.ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ
verses.en: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting

verses.ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَأَدۡبَٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.en: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration

verses.ar: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
verses.en: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ
verses.en: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves]

verses.ar: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
verses.en: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ
verses.en: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us

verses.ar: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِجَبَّارٖۖ فَذَكِّرۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.en: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat
